CS起源，作为一个对于我的游戏生涯来说， 是个承上启下的游戏。他承接了我的cs1.6，开启了我的csgo。都是由于这个游戏伴随着我的成长，我的童年才丰富多彩。cs已经成为我生命中的一部分。
我对cs的感情已经无法以言表。
cs起源 加上盗版我也玩了将近两到三千小时
技术是从0开始练的，几年时间 已经从菜鸟到了骨灰，这个游戏教了我很多，让我持之以恒，迎难而上，也让我在游戏过程中反省了自己，对这个游戏的态度也影响到了我的生活。我开始乐观的面对世界。cs  我永生难忘，我会永远支持他。
我想到我老了的时候，看到自己的孙子在带着VR玩cs的时候，我可能会哭吧。
（你们可能看出这行文不是很好
因为 真的有太多太多是语音表达不出来的啊。）
О боже как мне нравится сливать очки ,по -25))

Counter-Strike: Source is one of those legendary games. It might not have been that great in hindsight owing to iffy hit boxes and other such stuff, but back then I don't think much anyone cared. There wasn't much anything better that everyone was playing, so you just played it.

I played a lot of dust2, but there were a ton of other crazy, exciting, inventive games out there to play too. Surf, gungame, Warcraft source, zombie survival, zombie riot, jailbreak... a bunch of games which have been copy pasted into Gmod and even TF2 with varying degrees of success. I think even Hidden got its start here.

I can recommend the game still if only because it's cheap, you can pick it up in the Valve Complete Pack or Source Multiplayer Pack for relatively cheap whenever a sale's on (which with Valve games is frequently), and it's still a pretty good game - I think CS:GO might be better, but CS:S still has that certain 2004 charm to it. It's nostalgic, and not too dated.

At the very least, if you're 12, buy the damn game for Garry's Mod. Valve deserves your parent's money more than the jokers behind the latest 'zombie survival crafting multiplayer PvP' game.
